title: ExperienceEvent Commerce Details
description: This mixin is used to capture information regarding commerce activities related to an ExperienceEvent such as standard cart operations (order, checkout, abandon) and product details (SKU, product name, quantity).

xdm:productListItems.title: Product List Items
xdm:productListItems.description: A list of items representing a product selected by a customer with specific options and pricing that are for that usage context at a specific point of time and may differ from the product record.

xdm:commerce.title: Commerce
xdm:commerce.description: Commerce specific data related to this event.
